headline: Vistra to Report Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results on Feb. 26
summary: Vistra (NYSE: VST) plans to report its fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial and operating results on Thursday, Feb. 26, 2026, during a live conference call and webcast beginning at 10 a.m. ET (9 a.m. CT).

headline: Is It Time To Reassess Vistra (VST) After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Vistra's current share price reflects its true worth, this breakdown will help you connect the recent moves in the stock to what the numbers are saying about value. The stock has pulled back recently, with a 7 day return of an 11% decline, a 30 day return of a 0.8% decline, and a year to date return of a 2.9% decline, even though the 3 year return is very large and the 5 year return is also very large. Recent coverage around Vistra has focused on its role in the...

headline: Assessing Vistra (VST) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness And Strong Multi Year Returns
summary: Vistra overview and recent performance snapshot Vistra (VST) has been drawing fresh attention after a period of mixed share performance, with the stock roughly flat over the past month but showing a decline over the past 3 months and year. For context, the company recently closed at $160.36, with returns of about 0.2% over 1 day, an 11% decline over the past week, a 1% decline over the past month, and a 20% decline over the past 3 months. Over the past year, Vistra shows a 16% decline, while...
